T01bsu032_u:3: NOTE: Where a page break occurs within a word, the pagination mark has been shifted to the end of the word in order not to interfere with word search.
T01bsu032_u:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśatairabhijñātābhijñātaiḥ sthavirairmahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvairarhadbhiḥ tadyathā - sthavireṇa ca śāriputreṇa, mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena ca mahākapphiṇena
T01bsu032_u:9: mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena ca revatena ca śuddhipanthakena ca nandena ca ānandena ca rāhulena ca gavāṃpatinā ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena ca aniruddhena ca |
T01bsu032_u:12: tadyathā mañjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena, ajitena ca bodhisattvena,
T01bsu032_u:13: gandhahastinā ca bodhisattvena, nityodyuktena ca bodhisattvena,
T01bsu032_u:16: śakreṇa ca devānāmindreṇa, brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā |
T01bsu032_u:19: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayati sma - asti śāriputra paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhākṣetrāṇāmatikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ |
T01bsu032_u:20: tatra amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, dharmaṃ ca deśayati tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ
T01bsu032_u:21: sukhāvatītyucyate? tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau
T01bsu032_u:24: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate || Sukhs_2 ||
T01bsu032_u:25: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhirvedikābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ kiṅkiṇījālaiśca samalaṃkṛtā samantato
T01bsu032_u:28: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_3 ||
T01bsu032_u:29: punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ
T01bsu032_u:30: - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasya
T01bsu032_u:33: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samantāccaturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānām - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya |
T01bsu032_u:34: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samantādratnavṛkṣā jātāścitrā darśanīyāḥ saptānāṃ ratnānām - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasyāśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya
T01bsu032_u:35: | tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu santi padmāni jātāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni nīlanidarśanāni
T01bsu032_u:38: ( Sukhs, Vaidya 255.) avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanirbhāsāni avadātanidarśanāni |
T01bsu032_u:40: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_4
T01bsu032_u:41: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni tūryāṇi
T01bsu032_u:43: tatra ca buddhakṣetre triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇām |
T01bsu032_u:44: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste ekena purobhaktena koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vandanti anyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā |
T01bsu032_u:45: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhirabhyavakīrya punarapi tāmeva lokadhātumāgacchanti divāvihārāya |
T01bsu032_u:46: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_5 ||
T01bsu032_u:47: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre santi haṃsāḥ krauñcā mayūrāśca |
T01bsu032_u:48: te triṣkṛtvo rātro triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvanti sma,
T01bsu032_u:51: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate, dharmamanasikāra utpadyate,
T01bsu032_u:56: buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti, tiryagyonīnāṃ yamalokasya nāsti |
T01bsu032_u:57: te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghāstenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayanti |
T01bsu032_u:58: evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_6 ||
T01bsu032_u:59: punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati - tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṅgikasya divyasya tūryasya cāryaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati, evameva śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati |
T01bsu032_u:60: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati, dharmānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati, saṃghānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati |
T01bsu032_u:61: evarūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_7 ||
T01bsu032_u:62: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyurnāmocyate?
T01bsu032_u:63: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmaparimitamāyuḥpramāṇam |
T01bsu032_u:66: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya || Sukhs_8
T01bsu032_u:67: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho nāmocyate?
T01bsu032_u:68: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhā apratihatā sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu
T01bsu032_u:70: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ pramāṇamākhyātuḥ śuddhānāmarhatām
T01bsu032_u:71: evaḥrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ samalaḥkṛtaḥ tadbuddhakṣetram || Sukhs_9 ||
T01bsu032_u:72: punaraparaṃ śāriputra ye amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapannāḥ śuddhā bodhisattvā avinivartanīyā ekajātipratibaddhāsteṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇa mā.khyātumanyatrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ( Sukhs, Vaidya 256.) iti gacchanti |
T01bsu032_u:73: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyam |
T01bsu032_u:74: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? yatra hi nāma tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati |
T01bsu032_u:75: nāvaramātrakeṇa śāriputra kuśalamūlena amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyante
T01bsu032_u:76: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ
T01bsu032_u:77: śrutvā ca manasikariṣyati, ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā
T01bsu032_u:78: catūrātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati, yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati, tasya kālaṃ kurvataḥ so 'mitāyustathāgataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtaḥ purataḥ sthāsyati |
T01bsu032_u:80: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate
T01bsu032_u:81: tasmāttarhi śāriputra idamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāna eva vadāmi - satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra
T01bsu032_u:83: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi, evameva śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāmerurnāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato mañjudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ |
T01bsu032_u:84: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:85: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || Sukhs_11
T01bsu032_u:86: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi candrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho nāma tathāgato mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma tathāgato
T01bsu032_u:88: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:89: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'mitaskandho nāma tathāgato 'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato mahāratnaketurnāma
T01bsu032_u:91: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:92: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || Sukhs_13
T01bsu032_u:93: evamuttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato dundubhisvaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgataḥ ādityasaṃbhavo nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgataḥ |
T01bsu032_u:94: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra uttarāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:95: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || ( Sukhs, Vaidya 257.) evamadhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nāma tathāgato dharmadharo
T01bsu032_u:97: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra adhastāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:98: pratīyatha yūiyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || evamupariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo nāma tathāgata indraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gandhottamo nāma tathāgato gandhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskandho nāma tathāgato ratnakusumasaṃpuṣpitagātro nāma tathāgataḥ sālendrarājo nāma tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśī nāma tathāgataḥ sumerukalpo nāma tathāgataḥ |
T01bsu032_u:99: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti |
T01bsu032_u:100: pratīyatha yūyamidamacintyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyam || tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate? ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti, teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti, sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā
T01bsu032_u:102: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām |
T01bsu032_u:103: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti, kṛtaṃ vā kurvanti vā, sarve te 'vinivartanīyā
T01bsu032_u:107: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi, evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti |
T01bsu032_u:109: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kleśakaṣāye || Sukhs_18 ||
T01bsu032_u:110: tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye idamavocadbhagavānāttamanāḥ |
T01bsu032_u:111: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan || Sukhs_20 ||
